attributes.action: Decriminalise the carrying and use of pepper spray.
attributes.additional_details: Vulnerable groups are being targeted and should be given the means of self defence where physical intervention is not possible.
attributes.background: The Government should empower citizens and their right of self defence by decriminalising the carrying and appropriate use of pepper spray.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Legalise pepper spray in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742673
